# VEHICLE::SET_VEHICLE_WHEELS_CAN_BREAK_OFF_WHEN_BLOW_UP

## Summary
Allow wheels breaking off when car blows up

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** canWheelsBreakoff
